text:
[Verse]
Sunrise in my eyes
Birds singing sweet cries
Coffee steam that flies
New day bright surprise

[Verse 2]
Footsteps on the ground
Morning city sounds
Hearts begin to pound
Love is all around

[Chorus]
Magic in the air
Feel it everywhere
Jump without a care
Dance if you dare

[Verse 3]
Rays of golden light
Shine away the night
Morning feels so right
Everything so bright

[Bridge]
Sparkle in your stare
Morning magic rare
Nothing can compare
Life is here to share

[Verse 4]
Fresh dew on the leaves
Dreams that we believe
Sun and sky reprieve
Morning hope achieves
title: Morning Magic
